active_learning.discussion_prompt: How would you apply this concept in your work environment?
active_learning.peer_teaching: In pairs, one learner explains CTI's role in a prevented incident scenario (e.g., using MITRE ATT&CK to map a neutralized phishing campaign), including cost avoidance calculation. Switch roles after 5 minutes and provide feedback on clarity and accuracy.
active_learning.problem_solving: Analyze a case study: A threat intelligence platform detects and prevents a ransomware attack (T1486 from MITRE ATT&CK). Compute ROI using FAIR (assume LEF=0.5/year, LEM=$2M) and average breach costs from Verizon DBIR ($4.45M). Discuss integration with organizational KPIs.

distractor_protocol.step: Identify common misconceptions about the topic
Ensure distractors are similar in length and complexity
Include partial truths that require deeper understanding

Integrate learning objectives, active learning hooks, and voter consensus (e.g., FAIR calculations, MITRE ATT&CK, NIST CSF, Verizon DBIR). Big Picture Context: This metric quantifies proactive security's business value via prevented incidents, proving ROI for threat intel platforms.
